revised_title: Radioactive Waste Characteristics and Quantities in Nuclear Power Generation
tldr: This article estimates the total quantities and radioactive characteristics of wastes arising from civil nuclear power generation. It focuses on the radioactive content of wastes, which is determined by the number of fission reactions and the size of the nuclear program. The article also discusses the management of spent fuel and the different types of wastes produced in the process.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Waste Management
